title: Amazon's year-end Apple Watch sale drops Series 10 to $329
description: Grab the lowest price in 30 days on the Apple Watch Series 10 at Amazon — or pick up an SE 2 for under $200.Grab the lowest price in 30 days on the Apple Watch Series 10.Amazon has issued steeper price drops on Apple Watch models this weekend, with the Series 10 dipping back down to $329. This reflects a $70 discount off MSRP and is the lowest price seen in the past 30 days. html:
Grab the lowest price in 30 days on the Apple Watch Series 10 at Amazon — or pick up an SE 2 for under $200.

Amazon has issued steeper price drops on Apple Watch models this weekend, with the Series 10 dipping back down to $329. This reflects a $70 discount off MSRP and is the lowest price seen in the past 30 days. If budget is a priority, the Apple Watch SE 2 is marked down to $199 — the lowest Apple Watch price you can get across the range.

Apple Watch sale

  • 40mm Apple Watch SE 2 (Aluminum Case, GPS): $199 ($50 off)
  • 44mm Apple Watch SE 2 GPS (Aluminum Case, GPS): $229 ($50 off)
  • 42mm Apple Watch Series 10 (Aluminum Case, GPS): $329 ($70 off)
  • 46mm Apple Watch Series 10 (Aluminum Case, GPS): $359 ($70 off)
  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 with black case (GPS + Cellular): $734.89 ($65 off)

Why we're covering these deals: With the New Year on the horizon, many New Year's resolutions are fitness-oriented. And having a wearable to monitor steps and heart rate can aid in your fitness journey.

You can also check out the latest offers on additional band styles and case sizes in our Apple Watch Price Guide and Apple Watch deals roundup.
